tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geofence_alerts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  geofence_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  geofence_type ENUM('entry', 'exit') NOT NULL,
  alert_message TEXT NOT NULL,
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE geofence_alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  area_name VARCHAR(50),
  alert_type VARCHAR(10),
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE geo_coordinates (
  coordinate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  user_id INT,
  alert_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (alert_id) REFERENCES geofence_alerts(alert_id)
);

CREATE TABLE geofences (
    geofence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    latitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    radius DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    message TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    geofence_id UUID NOT NULL,
    is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
  longitude DECIMAL(9,6),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  area_id INT,
  alert_type VARCHAR(20),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
